allocate(bytes,uint256,bytes4,address).details: override this function to handle wrapping/allocation/moving funds to the respective protocol of this strategy

claimRewards().details: override this function to claim all available rewards from the respective protocol of this strategy

claimWithdrawalQueue(uint256).details: override this function to handle strategies with withdrawal queue NFT

deallocate(bytes,uint256,bytes4,address).details: override this function to handle unwrapping/deallocation/moving funds from the respective protocol of this strategy

getEstimatedYield().notice: get the current snapshotted estimated yield for this strategy. This call does not guarantee the latest up-to-date yield and there might be discrepancies from the respective protocols numbers.

setKillSwitch(bool).notice: enter/exit emergency mode for this strategy

setRiskClass(uint8).notice: recategorize this strategy to a different risk class

snapshotYield().notice: can be called by anyone to recalculate the estimated yields of this strategy based on external price oracles and protocol heuristics.
